Therefore<S>3767</S> being justified<S>1344</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>, we have<S>2192</S> peace<S>1515</S> with<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S> through<S>1223</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>:
By<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> we have<S>2192</S> access<S>4318</S> by faith<S>4102</S> into<S>1519</S> this<S>5026</S> grace<S>5485</S> wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> we stand<S>2476</S>, and<S>2532</S> rejoice<S>2744</S> in<S>1909</S> hope<S>1680</S> of the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> so, but<S>235</S> we glory<S>2744</S> in<S>1722</S> tribulations<S>2347</S> also<S>2532</S>: knowing<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> tribulation<S>2347</S> worketh<S>2716</S> patience<S>5281</S>;
And<S>1161</S> patience<S>5281</S>, experience<S>1382</S>; and<S>1161</S> experience<S>1382</S>, hope<S>1680</S>:
And<S>1161</S> hope<S>1680</S> maketh<S>2617</S> not<S>3756</S> ashamed<S>2617</S>; because<S>3754</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S> is shed abroad<S>1632</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> hearts<S>2588</S> by<S>1223</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> which<S>3588</S> is given<S>1325</S> unto us<S>2254</S>.
For<S>1063</S> when we<S>2257</S> were<S>5607</S> yet<S>2089</S> without strength<S>772</S>, in due<S>2596</S> time<S>2540</S> Christ<S>5547</S> died<S>599</S> for<S>5228</S> the ungodly<S>765</S>. <sup>in due time: or, according to the time</sup>
For<S>1063</S> scarcely<S>3433</S> for<S>5228</S> a righteous man<S>1342</S> will<S>599</S> one<S>5100</S> die<S>599</S>: yet<S>1063</S> peradventure<S>5029</S> for<S>5228</S> a good man<S>18</S> some<S>5100</S> would<S>5111</S> even<S>2532</S> dare<S>5111</S> to die<S>599</S>.
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> commendeth<S>4921</S> his<S>1438</S> love<S>26</S> toward<S>1519</S> us<S>2248</S>, in that<S>3754</S>, while we<S>2257</S> were<S>5607</S> yet<S>2089</S> sinners<S>268</S>, Christ<S>5547</S> died<S>599</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S>.
Much<S>4183</S> more<S>3123</S> then<S>3767</S>, being<S>1344</S> now<S>3568</S> justified<S>1344</S> by<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> blood<S>129</S>, we shall be saved<S>4982</S> from<S>575</S> wrath<S>3709</S> through<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S>, when we were<S>5607</S> enemies<S>2190</S>, we were reconciled<S>2644</S> to God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> the death<S>2288</S> of his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S>, much<S>4183</S> more<S>3123</S>, being reconciled<S>2644</S>, we shall be saved<S>4982</S> by<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> life<S>2222</S>.
And<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> so, but<S>235</S> we also<S>2532</S> joy<S>2744</S> in<S>1722</S> God<S>2316</S> through<S>1223</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, by<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> we have<S>2983</S> now<S>3568</S> received<S>2983</S> the atonement<S>2643</S>. <sup>atonement: or, reconciliation</sup>
Wherefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S>, as<S>5618</S> by<S>1223</S> one<S>1520</S> man<S>444</S> sin<S>266</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> death<S>2288</S> by<S>1223</S> sin<S>266</S>; and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> death<S>2288</S> passed<S>1330</S> upon<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S>, for<S>1909</S> that<S>3739</S> all<S>3956</S> have sinned<S>264</S>: <sup>for that: or, in whom</sup>
(For<S>1063</S> until<S>891</S> the law<S>3551</S> sin<S>266</S> was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>: but<S>1161</S> sin<S>266</S> is<S>1677</S> not<S>3756</S> imputed<S>1677</S> when there is<S>5607</S> no<S>3361</S> law<S>3551</S>.
Nevertheless<S>235</S> death<S>2288</S> reigned<S>936</S> from<S>575</S> Adam<S>76</S> to<S>3360</S> Moses<S>3475</S>, even<S>2532</S> over<S>1909</S> them that had<S>264</S> not<S>3361</S> sinned<S>264</S> after<S>1909</S> the similitude<S>3667</S> of Adam's<S>76</S> transgression<S>3847</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the figure<S>5179</S> of him that was to come<S>3195</S>.
But<S>235</S> not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> the offence<S>3900</S>, so<S>3779</S> also<S>2532</S> is the free gift<S>5486</S>. For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> through the offence<S>3900</S> of one<S>1520</S> many<S>4183</S> be dead<S>599</S>, much<S>4183</S> more<S>3123</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the gift<S>1431</S> by<S>1722</S> grace<S>5485</S>, which is<S>3588</S> by one<S>1520</S> man<S>444</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, hath abounded<S>4052</S> unto<S>1519</S> many<S>4183</S>.
And<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> it was by<S>1223</S> one<S>1520</S> that sinned<S>264</S>, so is the gift<S>1434</S>: for<S>1063</S> <S>3303</S> the judgment<S>2917</S> was by<S>1537</S> one<S>1520</S> to<S>1519</S> condemnation<S>2631</S>, but<S>1161</S> the free gift<S>5486</S> is of<S>1537</S> many<S>4183</S> offences<S>3900</S> unto<S>1519</S> justification<S>1345</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> by one man's<S>1520</S> offence<S>3900</S> death<S>2288</S> reigned<S>936</S> by<S>1223</S> one<S>1520</S>; much<S>4183</S> more<S>3123</S> they which receive<S>2983</S> abundance<S>4050</S> of grace<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> of the gift<S>1431</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S> shall reign<S>936</S> in<S>1722</S> life<S>2222</S> by<S>1223</S> one<S>1520</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.) <sup>by one man's: or, by one offence</sup>
Therefore<S>686</S> <S>3767</S> as<S>5613</S> by<S>1223</S> the offence<S>3900</S> of one<S>1520</S> judgment came upon<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S> to<S>1519</S> condemnation<S>2631</S>; even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> by<S>1223</S> the righteousness<S>1345</S> of one<S>1520</S> the free gift came upon<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S> unto<S>1519</S> justification<S>1347</S> of life<S>2222</S>. <sup>by the offence: or, by one offence</sup> <sup>by the righteousness: or, by one righteousness</sup>
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> by<S>1223</S> one<S>1520</S> man's<S>444</S> disobedience<S>3876</S> many<S>4183</S> were made<S>2525</S> sinners<S>268</S>, so<S>3779</S> <S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> the obedience<S>5218</S> of one<S>1520</S> shall<S>2525</S> many<S>4183</S> be made<S>2525</S> righteous<S>1342</S>.
Moreover<S>1161</S> the law<S>3551</S> entered<S>3922</S>, that<S>2443</S> the offence<S>3900</S> might abound<S>4121</S>. But<S>1161</S> where<S>3757</S> sin<S>266</S> abounded<S>4121</S>, grace<S>5485</S> did much more abound<S>5248</S>:
That<S>2443</S> as<S>5618</S> sin<S>266</S> hath reigned<S>936</S> unto<S>1722</S> death<S>2288</S>, even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> might<S>936</S> grace<S>5485</S> reign<S>936</S> through<S>1223</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> unto<S>1519</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S> by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>.
